languages.text:
Во время странствий вы услышите немало слухов — стоящие внимания Вольного Торговца сохранятся в журнале.
Порой слухи — это просто слухи, а порой — нечто большее. Чтобы проверить достоверность слуха, посетите указанное в описании место.
Чтобы посмотреть слухи, перейдите в журнал через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom} и выберите раздел "Слухи", нажимая {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
languages.original_text:
Во время странствий вы услышите немало слухов — стоящие внимания Вольного Торговца сохранятся в журнале.
Порой слухи — это просто слухи, а порой — нечто большее. Чтобы проверить достоверность слуха, посетите указанное в описании место.
Чтобы посмотреть слухи, перейдите в журнал через сервисное меню {console_bind|RightBottom} и выберите раздел "Слухи", нажимая {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours, and those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, or even something more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

On your travels, you will hear many rumours, and those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, or even something more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from the service menu {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick-access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

languages.text:
Durante tus viajes, escucharás muchos rumores. Los que merecen la atención de tu Comerciante Independiente se registran en el diario.
A veces los rumores son eso, rumores. Otras veces, hay algo de verdad en ellos, y en ocasiones hay más. Para verificar un rumor, viaja al lugar indicado por la descripción del rumor.
Para consultar los rumores que has oído, abre el diario con el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom} y accede a la sección de rumores pulsando {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
Durante tus viajes, escucharás muchos rumores. Los que merecen la atención de tu Comerciante Independiente se registran en el diario.
A veces los rumores son eso, rumores. Otras veces, hay algo de verdad en ellos, y en ocasiones hay más. Para verificar un rumor, viaja al lugar indicado por la descripción del rumor.
Para consultar los rumores que has oído, abre el diario con el acceso rápido {console_bind|RightBottom} y accede a la sección de rumores pulsando {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

languages.text:
旅をしていると、いろいろな噂を耳にするだろう。自由開拓者が注目するに値するものは、日誌に記録される。
だが、中には単なる噂に過ぎない場合もある。そこに真実がある場合もあれば、それ以上の何かが隠されていることも。噂の真偽を確かめるには、噂の説明文に示された場所に行かねばならない。
既知の噂を確認するには、クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から日誌を開き、{console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}を押して噂セクションを選択しよう。
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
旅をしていると、いろいろな噂を耳にするだろう。自由開拓者が注目するに値するものは、日誌に記録される。
単なる噂に過ぎない場合もある。そこに真実がある場合もあれば、それ以上の何かが隠されていることも。噂の真偽を確かめるには、噂の説明文に示された場所に行かねばならない。
既知の噂を確認するには、クイックアクセス{console_bind|RightBottom}から日誌を開き、{console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}を押して噂セクションを選択する。

languages.text:
在旅途中，您可能会听到很多传闻。所有值得行商浪人留意的传闻，都会记录在日志中。
有的传闻仅仅谣言而已。还有的传闻则是事实，而且可能隐藏着秘密。若要验证传闻真伪，您需要前往传闻描述的指定地点。
若要查看已知传闻，请按下{console_bind|RightBottom}快速打开日志，之后按下{console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}选择传闻部分。
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
在旅途中，您可能会听到很多传闻。所有值得行商浪人留意的传闻，都会记录在日志中。
有的传闻仅仅谣言而已。还有的传闻则是事实，而且可能隐藏着秘密。若要验证传闻真伪，您需要前往传闻描述的指定地点。
若要查看已知传闻，请按下{console_bind|RightBottom}快速打开日志，之后按下{console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}选择传闻部分。

languages.text:
Auf deinen Reisen wirst du viele Gerüchte hören. Diejenigen, welche die Aufmerksamkeit des Freihändlers verdienen, werden im Tagebuch festgehalten.
Manchmal sind Gerüchte nur Gerüchte. Gelegentlich ist an ihnen etwas Wahres dran, und in manchen Fällen sogar noch mehr. Um ein Gerücht zu überprüfen, reise zu dem Ort, der in der Beschreibung des Gerüchts angegeben ist.
Um bekannte Gerüchte zu überprüfen, öffne das Tagebuch über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} und wähle den Abschnitt Gerüchte durch Drücken von {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

Manchmal sind Gerüchte nur Gerüchte. Gelegentlich ist an ihnen etwas Wahres dran, und in manchen Fällen sogar noch mehr. Um ein Gerücht zu überprüfen, reise zu dem Ort, der in der Beschreibung des Gerüchts angegeben ist.
Um bekannte Gerüchte zu überprüfen, öffne das Tagebuch über den Schnellzugriff {console_bind|RightBottom} und wähle den Abschnitt Gerüchte durch Drücken von {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

languages.text:
Au cours de vos voyages, vous aurez vent de nombreuses rumeurs. Celles qui méritent l'attention du libre-marchand sont consignées dans le journal.
Parfois, ces rumeurs ne sont que des rumeurs. D'autres fois, elles sont partiellement, voire totalement fondées. Pour vérifier une rumeur, rendez-vous à l'endroit indiqué dans la description de la rumeur.
Pour consulter les rumeurs connues, ouvrez le journal via l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} et sélectionnez la section Rumeurs en appuyant sur {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
languages.original_text:
On your travels, you will hear many rumours. Those of them that are deserving of the Rogue Trader's attention are logged in the journal.
Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.

traits.locale_text:
Au cours de vos voyages, vous aurez vent de nombreuses rumeurs. Celles qui méritent l'attention du Libre-Marchand sont consignées dans le journal.
Parfois, ces rumeurs ne sont que des rumeurs. D'autres fois, elles sont partiellement, voire totalement fondées. Pour vérifier une rumeur, rendez-vous à l'endroit indiqué dans la description de la rumeur.
Pour consulter les rumeurs connues, ouvrez le journal à partir de l'accès rapide {console_bind|RightBottom} et sélectionnez la section Rumeurs en appuyant sur {console_bind|LeftTop}/{console_bind|RightTop}.

languages.text:
Yolculukların sırasında pek çok söylenti işiteceksin. Bunlardan Hür Tacir'in ilgisini layık olanlar seyir defterine kaydedilir.
Bazen söylentiler asılsızdır. Bazen ise hakikat payı barındırırlar. Hatta kimi durumlarda içlerinden hakikatten de fazlası çıkar. Bir söylentiyi doğrulamak için söylentinin açıklamasında belirtilen yere yolculuk et.
Bilinen söylentileri gözden geçirmek için hızlı erişimden {console_bind|RightBottom} seyir defterini aç ve {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp} düğmelerini kullanarak Söylentiler bölümünü seç.
languages.original_text:

Sometimes rumours are just that. Other times there is truth to them, and in some cases there may be even more. To verify a rumour, travel to the place indicated in the rumour's description.
To review known rumours, open the journal from quick access {console_bind|RightBottom} and select the Rumours section by pressing {console_bind|LeftUp}/{console_bind|RightUp}.
